story-context.story-summary:
Story 7-1 introduces an MCP-style tool server for external agents. The backend will expose tool discovery and invocation endpoints, backed by a lightweight tool registry that maps tool names to existing backend capabilities.
Key integrations: - OrchestratorAgent for knowledge.query tool - Rate limiter for tenant-based throttling - FastAPI router registration in main.py
